intro.paragraph1: Orbital Temple yɛ satellite a ɛwɔ adwinni adwuma: nkaeɛ a ɛwɔ ahunmu a wɔabue ama abɔdeɛ biara a ɔwɔ nkateɛ a ɔte anaa watena Asase so.
intro.paragraph2: Ɛnam mfiridwuma so no, obiara bɛtumi de obi din akɔ Asɔredan mu, obi a ɔwuiɛ, obi a ɔte aseɛ yie, anaa abɔdeɛ biara a ɔfata sɛ wɔkae no.

sculpture.heading: Nneɛma a Wɔayɛ no
sculpture.paragraph1: Adwinni no wɔ nneɛma abiɛsa a egyina so: satellite a wɔayɛ titiriw sɛ wɔde bɛkora din ɔpepepem pii so; ɔmanfo ohoni a wɔde satellite sesa nsɛm; ne wɛbsaet a wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu no nam so de edin ahorow no kɔ soro, efi mprempren kosi sɛ wobewu.
sculpture.paragraph2: Sɛ́ adwuma a ɛfa nneɛma ahorow pii ho no, wobetumi abu Orbital Asɔredan no sɛ ohoni a ɛwɔ beae pɔtee bi, a ɛtra ahunmu. Ɛsan nso yɛ Artsat adwuma.

antenna.heading: Antenna Sɛ Ɔmanfo Nsusuwii
antenna.paragraph1: Antena a ɛka yɛn ne ahunmu bom.
antenna.paragraph2: Wɔreyɛ antena bi a ɛne satellite a ɛtwa ho hyia no bedi nkitaho tẽẽ.
antenna.paragraph3: Esiane sɛ sika kɔkɔɔ a ɛdannan ade, a ɛyɛ wim ahwehwɛ wɔ n’atifi nti, ɛyɛ mfiase ma mass stimulation (anaasɛ yɛn abusuabɔ a ɛda nea ɛwɔ ‘ɔsoro hɔ’ ntam).
antenna.paragraph4: Bere a wɔmfa nsusuwso ahorow no nsi wiase mmeae dodow no ara no, yɛn Frames from Earth a mprempren ɛredi satellite no so no de edin ahorow no remena wɔ ɔkwan biara a wɔfa so no so.
antenna.paragraph5: Boa ma wɔmfa saa anisoadehu yi mmra wo kurow no mu —fa antenna ahoni a ɛkanyan nkɔmmɔbɔ ahorow a ɛfa ahunmu nhwehwɛmu, adwinni, ne yɛn beae a yɛkyɛ wɔ amansan mu ho sisi hɔ. Sua pii fa adwuma no a wobɛboa ho .
